mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM AS NO, T.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT sld.LANG_CODE as langCode, (SELECT DATA FROM SYS_LANG_DATA WHERE LANG_CODE = sld.LANG_CODE AND LANG_TYP = 'KO') as langKo, (SELECT DATA FROM SYS_LANG_DATA WHERE LANG_CODE = sld.LANG_CODE AND LANG_TYP = 'EN') as langEn, (SELECT DATA FROM SYS_LANG_DATA WHERE LANG_CODE = sld.LANG_CODE AND LANG_TYP = 'CN') as langCn, (SELECT DATA FROM SYS_LANG_DATA WHERE LANG_CODE = sld.LANG_CODE AND LANG_TYP = 'VN') as langVn FROM SYS_LANG_DATA sld ORDER BY sld.LANG_CODE) T
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_LANG_DATA (LANG_CODE, LANG_TYP, DATA) VALUES (#{langCode}, #{langTyp}, #{langData})
